user_query: I want to plan a road trip across Europe by suggesting must-visit cities and attractions in France, Italy, Germany, and Spain, including driving directions and estimated travel times.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of must-visit cities and attractions in France, Italy, Germany, and Spain.
Retrieve driving directions between the selected cities in France, Italy, Germany, and Spain.
Calculate estimated travel times between the selected cities based on driving directions.
Compile all researched information into a comprehensive travel itinerary.
